title: Teacher Training Program for Wiki-Based Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Social Studies Education Experience
context.additional_context: Most learners are familiar with digital tools but have limited experience with wiki platforms. Optimization for microlearning environments using mobile devices is necessary.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more collaborative learning activities using a wiki platform
Learners can apply a gradual collaborative learning process according to the five stages of the Salmon model
Learners can enhance their ability to share instructional design knowledge while maintaining a balance between individual and group assignments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
